content.raw: minor note, unfortunately, default `mu3 = 1` and default `patch_radius = 0`, which means we end up computing torsional friction constraints with zero patch area, small extra work without changing the results from before this PR.  On the other hand if we do check patch radius as well as friction coefficient to enable `dContactMu3`, the check could be a bit more involved.
content.html: minor note, unfortunately, default mu3 = 1 and default patch_radius = 0, which means we end up computing torsional friction constraints with zero patch area, small extra work without changing the results from before this PR. On the other hand if we do check patch radius as well as friction coefficient to enable dContactMu3, the check could be a bit more involved.
